Title: Relates to the prosecution of certain juveniles between the ages of 16 and 18 charged with certain felony offenses, including possession of a firearm
Summary: Relates to the prosecution of certain juveniles between the ages of 16 and 18 charged with certain felony offenses, including possession of a firearm; relates to the transfer of such cases to family court.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the family court act, in relation to the prosecution of certain juveniles charged with certain felony crimes and the handling of such cases
